This action posts messages to Chatter feeds (user, group, or record feeds).

Backend Configuration

  • feedType (String): Type of feed - "User", "Group", or "Record" (required)
  • targetId (String): Default target ID (User ID, Group ID, or Record ID)

Parameters (AI will provide)

  • messageText (String): The message content to post (required)
  • topics (Array): Optional topics to associate with the post
